channel.title: h3 on Fabrice Aneche
channel.description: Recent content in h3 on Fabrice Aneche

item.title: Surprising result while transpiling C to Go
item.description: H3 is a geospacial indexing library created by Uber, if you are familiar with this blog it’s similar to S2. Uber is providing h3 for Go unfortunately it’s a CGO version, a C to Go binding as you may know CGO is not Go. Having a native Go library is easier to deal with but would mean a full rewrite. Transpiling You may have heard about a recent effort to transpile C to Go using ccgo and the associated libc.
